title: Insights into Functions of Universal Stress Proteins Encoded by Genomes of Gastric Cancer Pathogen
authors: Isokpehi RD, Simmons SS, Makolo AU, Hollman AL, Adesida SA, Ojo OO, Abioye AO
abstract: The genes that encode the universal stress protein (USP) family domain (pfam00582) aid the survival of bacteria in specific host or habitat-induced stress conditions. Genome sequencing revealed that the genome of
